item.title: Bangalore to Trivandrum Solo Travel Plan
item.description: Traveling solo from Bangalore to Trivandrum is a refreshing experience, especially if you enjoy culture, beaches, history and relaxed city life. Trivandrum (Thiruvananthapuram), the capital of Kerala, blends tradition with natural beauty, making it a perfect destination for a peaceful solo getaway. Here is a detailed and easy-to-follow plan for your trip. How to Travel From Bangalore to Trivandr
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Bangalore to Kochi Solo Trip plan
item.description: Two to Three days trip from Bangalore to Kochi, If you are Solo riding on a MotorBike or You are a Family driving in a Car, then this two to three days plan works very well to cover Kochi and one couple more quick visits in Mysore, Ooty and Coimbatore on the way. Kochi, called as Queen of the Arabian Sea, is one of the major port cities in the coast of India and also has trading from 14th ce
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
